q: `` I asked a successful guy,`` What's the best advice you can give me?'' He said,`` Simon Cowell , know when to leave the fair,'' he said. I think that's good advice- one year, I actually found myself thinking,`` I've run out of insults, I don't know how I'm going to tell people they suck.`` Something inside you says,` You know what, it's time to go.`` I've enjoyed myself, I mean it's not the most difficult job in the world, is it? he added.
